src.core.parser module¶

Parser based on Relation by ltworf http://ltworf.github.io/relational

class src.core.parser.Node(expression)¶

Bases: object

to_python()¶
src.core.parser.convert_to_python(query)¶
src.core.parser.parse(query)¶

This function generates a list of tokens

Parameters:query – A string to be tokenize
Returns:A list of tokens

src.core.relation module¶

class src.core.relation.Relation(filename='')¶

Bases: object

This class represents a relation/table as a set of tuples. Fields is a list, where indexes are connected with the indexes of the tuples.

Parameters:filename – .csv or .prf file
insert(record)¶

Inserts a register

Parameters:record – A record (tuple)
project(*args)¶

The project operator returns a new relation. Extract columns (attributes) resulting in a vertical subset of attributes of the relation

Parameters:args – A tuple of field names
Returns:A new relation with the new fields
select(expression)¶

The select operator returns a new relation with the tuples that satisfy an expression.

Parameters:expression – A python valid expression
Returns:A new relation with the tuples that satisfy an expression
